body.bibl: Tamcke, Martin. “The Relationship between Theological Teaching and Religious Practice by the East-Syrian Christians in Qatar (Sixth–Seventh Centuries).” In Religious Culture in Late Antique Arabia: Selected Studies on the Late Antique Religious Mind, edited by Kirill Dmitriev and Isabel Toral-Niehoff, 89–102.
